英文公告.附加說明: 101 year glory people meals supply and kitchen helper service1.on january 1 honors an agreement the sign supply from 101 years to december31.2.meets the following condition,the agreement continues this for approximately one year:(1)after the meals questionnaire,previounts to 80 points above for qualified.(2)the 4th season (in october)handle the supplementary contract wish investigation, the recycling questionnaire number must reach 70%th cooking population,but agreed that approximately reaches 85%(including)above,the institution continues the year in the expiration of terms of obligation and the manufacturer agreement.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.31.86機關名稱：行政院國軍退除役官兵輔導委員會桃園榮譽國民之家
決標資料.附加說明: 1.自101年1月1日起至12月31日履行履約標的供應. 2.符合下列條件,得同意延續本約一年.(1)經伙食問卷,前三季伙食滿意度均達80分(含)以上者為合格.(2)第四季(10月份)辦理續約意願調查,回收問卷數須達起伙人數之百分之七十,而其中同意約達85%(含)以上者,機關得於契約期滿與廠商協議續約一年.
